column4: I just discovered a nasty bug in hardy's network settings manager. if I disconnect my dsl modem by unchecking the pppoe connection's checkbox and check it again afterwards to reconnect the following happens:

the check is there for two seconds and disappears again, leaving me without internet connection. the only way to establish the connection is to click on the box and then on "close", before the check has a chance to remove itself.
took my a while to figure that out...
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
